messages.message: How expensive is pinning a Crafting Sandbox? I had pinned my sandbox for the last couple of weeks (initially for a test and then I forgot to unpin it :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:) and noticed that my day started much better for those two weeks. Normally, the sandbox shuts down every day and I have to restart it at the start of the next day. I usually end up wasting ~15 mins in this process and sometimes more, if I need to resolve issues with services not starting up correctly. Is it ok to leave it pinned for ever?

If it is not ok to leave it pinned, can we request a "schedule" feature with Crafting (assuming it doesn't already exist), where based on our work schedule, the sandbox automatically starts (in addition to stopping which it already does) before the start of our work day?
Actually, may be this isn't too hard to do locally using cron (but it will be better if there's a global solution so we can save everyone's time).
